title: That's it. I'm quitting.
body:
League just hasn't lived up to my expectations at all, and today is the last straw. Something on the home page caught my eye... and a flicker of hope went through my body. My heart started beating faster, as I squinted at the beautiful sight.  I clicked on the image with trembling trepidation, scrolling down slowly... Then it was over. A sheen of sweat covered my body, as the rage descended on me. I read the names slowly, hovering over each horrible, filthy champion. Lulu... Jinx... Janna... Poppy. I slammed my laptop down, fury coursing through my blood.


Star Guardian Urgot wasn't there.




EDIT:  This is my most popular post of all time. I kinda predicted this, you guys sure do love your spicy memes.

_3.88 GB / 6401 files all-in in LoL image material though._

This should work.

But I see I have some that you don't have, though - mostly in the "comics"-department.

_There might be some doublets in there._

Lemme know when you've DLed it. :)

P.S. to the mods:
Left the "NSFW" stuff out of it.

EDIT:
Link removed - 4 days should be plenty, and 3 days more than I expected.
I have no idea how you've managed to keep that name lmao

I dunno, Rito doesn't seem to give a shit. I mean I have seen names like SonaGivesTitJobs (dude has had this name for about a year now). I've seen Isuckdikformoney, and various racial epithets (club names are popular for that too). I really think the only time people really report someone for their name is if they're butthurt about losing and have literally nothing else to report for.
